t:
“We're sorry ma'am, but we've no idea why you keep getting these recurring headaches.”


“Ah! That's okay,” replied the thing inside her head, pulling her vocal cords.
c:
“I no longer have the headaches,” she coughed.



#headaches #possess #control #scifishortstory #nocure #talk
